Title:
Black Excellence in Engineering Symposium
To kick off Black Alumni Weekend, UVA Engineering will spotlight Black Excellence in the engineering community through this event featuring alumni and faculty perspectives. Pre-registration required.

UVA Physics Hoxton Lecture: John Preskill
The quantum laws governing atoms and other tiny objects seem to defy common sense, and information encoded in quantum systems has weird properties that baffle our feeble human minds.
